C

calculateAndSetAvailableSeatsCount(ReservationsDatabase, int, int) - Method in class user.AddDataToTable
Calculates the number of available seats in a screening and sets the corresponding member variable of AddDataToTable Object, availableSeats, to this value.
Chairs - Class in user
Holds data such as the seat Id, whether the seat is available for booking, whether the seat is selected for booking by the user, and the corresponding button in the makeReservation window.
Chairs(Button, String, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class user.Chairs
Chairs object initialized with btn, id, bookSeat, occupied
Chairs(Button, String) - Constructor for class user.Chairs
Chairs object initialized with btn and id
changeGraphic(Chairs) - Method in class user.MakeReservationController
When graphic (chair) is clicked on the icon changes.
changeViewingDayListings(ActionEvent) - Method in class employee.AdminController
When date on datePicker is changed the method sets text on the viewingsLbl to display the selected date.
checkForOverlap(String, String, String) - Method in class employee.AddFilmController
Takes the 'film name', 'date' and 'time' of the screening the user is trying to add.
checkForOverlapDuration(String, String, String, int) - Method in class employee.AddFilmController
Takes the 'film name', 'date', 'duration' and 'time' of the screening the user is trying to add.
clickToBook(ActionEvent) - Method in class user.MakeReservationController
When a chair is clicked the image is changed according to the change graphic method
compareTimes(String, Date, String, int) - Method in class employee.AddFilmController
Takes parameters for two films.
confirm(ActionEvent) - Method in class user.EditUserProfileController
When Button is pressed variables 'currentUsername', 'currentEmail' and 'currentPassword' are all set to the text contained in the TextFields.
convertToDateObject(String) - Method in class employee.AddFilmController
Takes a date as a String and converts it to a Date object.
countRowsInResultSet(ResultSet) - Method in class sqlitedatabases.SQLiteDatabase
Returns number of rows in a ResultSet
createEmployeeAccount(ActionEvent) - Method in class employee.AddNewEmployeeController
Takes data entered in NewEmployee.fxml TextFields and adds a new employee account to the database.

add reservation with userId, screeningId and seatId
